Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/12/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Traded from Toronto to Los Angeles on 2/14/1986 (Going to LAD: P Juan Berenguer, P Ron Davis, C Ernie Whitt, 1B Fred McGriff, 3B Mike Bordick. Going to TOR: P Rick Sutcliffe, C Mike Scioscia)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Atlanta on 7/19/1987 (Going to LAD: P Hipolito Pichardo. Going to ATL: 2B Mike Bordick, P Brian Bohanon)...
Had first career hit on 9/9/1988, off Rick Reuschel (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/12/1988, off Tom Candiotti (PIT)...
Injured on 8/11/1990 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $782,857 through salary arbitration...
